name: Toot's Race
description:
Heave ho, let’s RACE!

Join Toot the Tiny Tugboat in Toot’s Race: a thrilling boat racing game for little ones! Toot lines up alongside the other boats from the Harbour to race around four distinct tracks, each with their own theme and unique features.

*** Nominated for BAFTA Cymru 'Best Game Award' 2016 ***
*** Nominated for 'Best Racing Game' at TIGA Game Awards 2016 ***

Inspired by the adventures from the television series, players can race alongside sunny beaches or through icy winter waters, collecting sparkly speed boosts and avoiding obstacles like seaweed, beach-balls... and a giant whale! The characters banter with each other as they jostle for position and progress around the track, with the rest of the cast cheering them on from the sidelines.

Created by an award winning children's app developer, this game is suitable for preschool age and up.

Game Features:

- Original dialogue from the voice cast of the animated series
- Hear your favourite characters talk to Toot!
- A bold and colourful 3D world
- 4 themed race tracks and 2 play modes
- Lots of features and rewards for little ones
- Child-friendly app
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases
- Dual language - the game can be set to English or Welsh from the Options menu

Also in the Toot app series: exploration game 'Toot's Harbour'

For more information about Toot the Tiny Tugboat, sail over to: http://www.tootthetinytugboat.com
Support contact: developer@thudmedia.com
